title: Unauthorized computer access in the second degree
context: ยง708-895.6 Unauthorized computer access in the second degree. (1) A person commits the offense of unauthorized computer access in the second degree if the person knowingly accesses a computer, computer system, or computer network without authorization and thereby obtains information. (2) Unauthorized computer access in the second degree is a class B felony. [L 2001, c 33, pt of ยง1; am L 2012, c 293, ยง5]
